member.name: T:nanoFramework.Json.JsonSerializer
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonSerializer.SerializeObject(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert an object to a JSON string.
member.param: The value to convert. Supported types are: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and .
Is the object top in hierarchy. Default true.
member.returns: The JSON object as a string or null when the value type is not supported.
member.remarks: For objects, only internal properties with getters are converted.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonSerializer.SerializeIEnumerable(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Convert an IEnumerable to a JSON string.
member.returns: The JSON object as a string or null when the value type is not supported.

member.summary: Convert an IDictionary to a JSON string.
member.returns: The JSON object as a string or null when the value type is not supported.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Json.SerializationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when there is an problem with a serialization operation. Check the comment from where the exception has been throw to learn the cause.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Json.DeserializationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when there is an problem with a deserialization operation. Check the comment from where the exception has been throw to learn the cause.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between .NET types and JSON types.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert an object to a JSON string.
member.param: The value to convert. Supported types are: Boolean, String, Byte, (U)Int16, (U)Int32, Float, Double, Decimal, Array, IDictionary, IEnumerable, Guid, Datetime, DictionaryEntry, Object and null.
member.returns: The JSON object as a string or null when the value type is not supported.
member.remarks: For objects, only public properties with getters are converted.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.summary: Converts a vCal or iCal date string into a DateTime object.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.ToIso8601(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a DateTime object into an ISO 8601 string. This version always returns the string in UTC format.

member.summary: Returns true if the given string contains only numeric characters.
